items.name: Greed's Embrace
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: 30% reduced Strength Requirement
14% increased Quantity of Items found
50% increased Rarity of Items found
-10% to Fire Resistance
+20% to Cold Resistance
-20% to Lightning Resistance

flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 37% more Chaos Damage
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Chaos Damage
Supported Skills deal no Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports bow attack skills that fire arrows forwards as projectiles. These skills will instead fire a payload arrow into the air to land at a targeted location. The supported skills' arrows will then fire out in a circle from where it lands. Cannot support skills that already fire arrows into the air, channelled skills, or skills that create Minions.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 13% less Projectile Damage

Supported Skills fire a Payload Arrow into the air
Projectiles from the Supported Skill Fire from where the Payload Arrow lands
Supported Skills Fire Projectiles in a circle
Supported Skills fire 5 additional Projectiles
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Projectile Damage
Supported Skills can only be used with Bows
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

items.name: Widowhail
explicitMods: 242% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which makes nearby allies inflict impale with attacks, and lessens the accuracy of nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
